text: apane beech rasool ke bulaane ko tum aapas mein ek-doosare jaisa bulaana na samajhana. allaah un logon ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai jo tumamen se aise hai ki (ek-doosare kee) aad lekar chupake se khisak jaate hai. atah unako, jo usake aadesh kee avahelana karate hai, darana chaahie ki kahee aisa na ho ki unapar koee aazamaish aa pade ya unapar koee dukhad yaatana aa jae
